sources.title: Gentlemen of Fortune
sources.description:
Famous soviet comedy about a kind-hearted head of a kindergarten who looks just like a criminal who escaped from prison. Employees of the criminal investigation department decided to use this similarity to search for stolen archaeological treasures.

IMDb rating: 8,4

Year of production: 1971

Director: Seryy Alexander
Writers: Danelia Georgy Nikolaevich, Tokareva Victoria
Composer: Gladkov Gennady

Cast: Leonov Evgeny, Papanov Anatoly, Muratov Radner, Garin Erast, Fateeva Natalya, Kramarov Savely, Olyalin Nikolay, Springfeld Pavel, Sokolova Lyubov, Vitsin Georgy Mikhailovich

metadata.Plot: A kindergarten director Troshkin is a dead ringer for a criminal nicknamed "Docent" who stole the priceless headpiece of Alexander the Great during an archaeological expedition. But after militia "inputs" Troshkin into the criminal environment he has nothing left to do but to carefully play out the part of his "evil twin".
metadata.Actors: Evgeniy Leonov, Georgiy Vitsin, Saveliy Kramarov
